ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Getting really Annoyed
ygData.msgSnippet: ... they may be incredibly rare, but what if it happened to you?  i bet you wouldn t have it so far down on the priority list then.  what is the higher
ygData.messageBody:
At 10:21 AM 8/24/00 -0600, you wrote:
>Have to disagree, vehemently. Corpse and Item poofing bugs are incredibly
>rare. I know well over 100 players and none of them have ever encountered
>even a single one. Item duping bugs are more easily solved by banning the
>dupers, otherwise they will just find another way. Bugs to a song that
>every bard over a certain level would use every single day if it were fixed
>are far more important. Nut again it shows Verant's bias, which apparently
>you buy into. Pleasing the small percentage of 8+ hour a day players is
>more important than pleasing the vast majority who play 2 hours a day or
>less.
>
> Kit

they may be incredibly rare, but what if it happened to you? i bet you wouldn't
have it so far down on the priority list then. what is the higher priority, something
people have already learned to work around or something which can wipe out
hundreds of hours of playtime on a character?

you know well over 100 players, eh? out of the 200000 subscribers. yeah, that's
an appropriate sample size to determine that poofed corpses are just not a problem.
